text: István Turu (25 September 1962 – February 2021) was a Hungarian boxer. He competed in the men's lightweight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. He was born in Törökszentmiklós, Hungary. Turu died from COVID-19 during the pandemic in Hungary in February 2021, aged 58.Koronavírusban meghalt Turu István ökölvívó ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Hungary Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Boxers
title: István Turu
